page.title: 14Swindon Fish and Chip Shop
page.content: The fish and chip shop stands in High Street,Swindon and is run by Mr and Mrs Yerolemou.It opens six days a week from 12pm to 1.30pm and from 5pm to 11.15pm. It sells chips at 32p or 40p,fish at 73p,chicken at 85p,pies at 60p(large) or 55p(small) and peas at 20p. The fish is delivered daily and they are prepared and cooked a few at a time.The potatoes for chips have to be peeled and chipped by a machine.The fish and chips are cooked in a large fryer which contains vegetable oil.This oil is hard when new and comes in boxes and has to be melted before it can be used.The fryer is heated by gas. Chickens are cooked for 65mins, 8 at a time on a spit grill. Everything in the shop has to be cleaned regularly,usually on a Sunday. Hands always have to be washed and food is never touched by hand.
